text: Donald Andrew Lund (May 18, 1923 - December 10, 2013) was a backup outfielder in Major League Baseball. He played for the Brooklyn Dodgers (1945, 1947, 1948[start]), St. Louis Browns (1948[end]) and Detroit Tigers (1949â€“1954). He batted and threw right-handed. He died on December 10, 2013 at the age of 90 in Ann Arbor, Michigan at his home from natural causes. ==Other websites== *Baseball Library Entry for Don Lund *Vintage Card Traders 1954 Series Don Lund Card Category:1923 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Major League Baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:Brooklyn Dodgers players Category:Detroit Tigers players
